page.title: 05BUSES & LORRIES IN CHARD
page.content:
Over a few days in June we went into Chard to ask people their opinions on the lorries in town.We interviewed people at various busy places such as the town centre,the museum and Manor Court School. The questions we asked were:- 1)Do you like lorries? 60% of the people said no. 2)Do you think they pollute the atmosphere?90% of the people think they do.
{BUSES Two double decker and three single decker buses go through Chard every half hour to Taunton,Weymouth and Bridport.They take a long time because they go through all the villages.
